entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6 except plus 1 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening then periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Friday 17 March 2023
